swirl.workspace
Class Peer

java.lang.Object
  swirl.workspace.Peer
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.picocontainer.Startable
Direct Known Subclasses:
BasePeer, DNSSDPeer, JmDNSPeer
public abstract class Peer
extends Object
implements org.picocontainer.Startable

DOCUMENT ME!

Author:
bpillet Base class for peers to extend. Represents a peer in the swirl network and manages connecting to the server and executing methods on the server.

          how many times the peer tries to execute a method before it gives up
